frontmatter.title: Katana Duplication Glitch
frontmatter.description: The Katana duplication glitch has gone viral. Everyone is rushing to get their own samurai sword.

frontmatter.title: Tireless Terraforming - Destroy, Build, Round the Corner
frontmatter.description: I'm going to spend the next ten days moving my villagers' houses to the beach so I can properly terraform this area.

frontmatter.title: Crooked Popularity - Raymond
frontmatter.description: Raymond is one of the exceedingly popular villagers in ACNH. Just why is this suited cat so uncattingly popular?

frontmatter.title: Crime - Flower Thief Caught!
frontmatter.description: A flower thief was caught at smolcano's island. The thief faces a $300 fine.

frontmatter.title: WFH with a Nintendo Switch
frontmatter.description: In the current Work-from-Home economy, many people own Nintendo switches. How do they navigate the demands of actual work and the full-time job of being Resident Representative on their islands?
